cookeville.title: Early Bird Flower Deals
cookeville.body: 20% off all eighths before 11am, Monday through Friday.

cookeville.title: Veterans Appreciation Week
cookeville.body: Veterans get an extra 15% off storewide. Bring valid ID.

cookeville.title: Edible Bundle Bonus
cookeville.body: Buy any 3 gummies or chocolates and get 500 loyalty points.

crossville.title: New Member Gift
crossville.body: Sign up for GreenHaus Rewards and receive a complimentary pre-roll.

crossville.title: Weekend Vibes
crossville.body: BOGO 50% off on cartridges every Friday and Saturday.

crossville.title: Wellness Wednesday
crossville.body: CBD tinctures and topicals 30% off all day.

crossville.title: Harvest Fest Giveaway
crossville.body: Spend $100+ and spin the prize wheel for merch or accessories.
